title: Poems for Shostakovich: "Dying Wish," "First Denunciation," "To Shostakovich"

history.message:
Hi Eric Machan,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review
Took "First Denunciation" from that. Continue by email.
No email response sent to submitter.
